about_the_game:
ULTIMATE FREEDOM—

Create your ultimate RPG character, play solo or adventure with friends, and determine your fate in an ever-expanding world. With no level restrictions, go anywhere, at any time in a truly open world. In The Elder Scrolls Online, the choice is yours.

CHOOSE YOUR ADVENTURE—

With a new tutorial, begin your adventure where you like: emerge from Coldharbour in the Base Game, battle Dragons in the Elsweyr Chapter, or get ready to face the Prince of Destruction, Mehrunes Dagon, in Blackwood. All content is accessible for new players, and you can switch adventures whenever you like.

PLAY BLACKWOOD CHAPTER—

As part of the Gates of Oblivion adventure, a deal made with the Prince of Destruction comes due in Blackwood. Explore Imperial cities and murky bogs, uncover Mehrunes Dagon's sinister plot, and never adventure alone with the Companions System.

content_descriptors.notes:
Blood and gore
Sexual themes
Use of alcohol
Violence

detailed_description:
WHICH EDITION IS RIGHT FOR ME?

Depending on your history with ESO, there are two versions of Blackwood that you first need to consider:

For New ESO Players: The Elder Scrolls Online Collection: Blackwood—Includes the base game, the 2021 Blackwood Chapter and ALL previous Chapters (Morrowind, Summerset, Elsweyr, and Greymoor)

For Current/Former ESO Players: The Elder Scrolls Online: Blackwood Upgrade—Includes the 2021 Blackwood Chapter exclusively

The Collection is perfect if you’re a new player looking to take your first steps into Tamriel, while the Upgrade is ideal for existing players who already own the base game and some (or all!) of the previous Chapters. Even better, the Collection grants new players access to the base game and previous Chapters! Even if you’re an existing player, the Collection with all the previous Chapters might be a great deal for you.


Collector's Edition


Purchase The Elder Scrolls Online Collection: Blackwood CE to receive additional bonus Collector's Edition in-game content including:

  • Battlefield Nightmare Senche Mount
  • Jewel-Feathered Sep Adder Pet
  • Temperamental Grimoire Memento
  • Deadlands Gladiator Outfit Style
  • Offer Weapon Emote

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac® High Sierra v 10.13
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon Pro 560 graphics (4GB of VRAM)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 85 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: OpenGL: 4.1
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac® High Sierra v 10.13
  • Processor: Intel i5 processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon Pro 560 graphics (4GB of VRAM)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 85 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: OpenGL: 4.1

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core i3 540 or AMD A6-3620 or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct X 11.0 compliant video card with 1GB RAM (NVidia GeForce 460 or AMD Radeon 6850)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 85 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core i5 2300 or AMD FX4350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct X 11.0 compliant video card with 2GB RAM (NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 750 or AMD Radeon™ HD 7850) or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 85 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
